definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: Pictures of insurgents firing an anti-aircraft missile in Iraq .
sentences.chinese: 有關伊拉克叛亂分子發射防空導彈的錄像。

sentences.english: Make sure you have anti-tank and anti-air support for your Artillery.
sentences.chinese: 確保你的炮兵擁有反坦克和防空支援。

sentences.english: The training of Air Defence Battalion’s officers and non-commissioned officers will be started in September, using the delivered equipment.
sentences.chinese: 9月份，將開始對防空營的軍官士兵進行訓練。

sentences.english: The anti-aircraft guns riddled the plane's wings with bullets.
sentences.chinese: 防空炮把機翼打得彈痕累累。

sentences.english: Everybody quickly went to the bomb shelter when the alert sounded.
sentences.chinese: 防空警報響起時，大家都快速進了防空洞。

sentences.english: Everybody quickly went to the bomb shelter when the alert sounded.
sentences.chinese: 防空警報響起時，大家都快速進了防空洞。

sentences.english: Until recently, the construction of large bomb shelters was mainly the work of governments.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近，建造大型防空洞才成爲政府的主要工作。

sentences.english: The air raid sirens were suddenly heard to warn people to take shelter at once.
sentences.chinese: 大家忽然聽到了防空警報，急忙尋找掩護。

sentences.english: Javelin Soldier IFVs are a very good anti-vehicle, anti-air, and anti-building unit.
sentences.chinese: 標槍兵IFV是非常好的反裝甲，防空，反建築單位。

sentences.english: On the issue of the South China Sea ADIZ, we have made our position clear on many occasions.
sentences.chinese: 關於“南海防空識別區”問題，中方已多次闡明立場。

sentences.english: Will China establish other AirDefense Identification Zones?
sentences.chinese: 中國還會建立其他的防空識別區嗎？

sentences.english: Every year the army and thd mavy hold maneuvers for practice.
sentences.chinese: 每年陸軍和海渾都舉行防空演習。

sentences.english: The air defense troops assignments uses dynamic programming method to establish the numeric model.
sentences.chinese: 防空兵羣兵力分配，運用動態規劃方法建立數學模型。

sentences.english: Break-off attacks are used when there is a threat of enemy air defenses beyond the target.
sentences.chinese: 脫離攻擊在目標擁有較大威脅防空武器時採用。

sentences.english: But in any case, the nuclear bunkers have dropped out of use.
sentences.chinese: 但是無論如何，核武防空洞已經退出使用。

definition: early warning aircraft system, e.g. US AWACS
